text:
[Verse]
Up in the night sky
Wishes do fly
Dreams in our eyes
Reaching so high

[Verse 2]
Moonlight so bright
Holding on tight
Shining so light
Into the night

[Chorus]
Shooting stars
Lighting our hearts
Chasing dreams
Never too far

[Verse 3]
Under the glow
Let it all flow
Moments we know
Feelings that grow

[Chorus]
Shooting stars
Lighting our hearts
Chasing dreams
Never too far

[Verse 4]
Whispers and sighs
Passing on by
Catch them
Let's try
No need to ask why
title: Shooting Stars
